```{r}
#| label: Libraries & Datasets
#| echo: false
#| message: false
# Loading Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(ggplot2)
library(dcData)
library(knitr)
library(tinytex)
library(stringr)

# Loading Datasets
data <- read.csv("~/GitHub/Sec4_FP_BryanXiao_DaiwikKashyap/data/data.csv", header=TRUE, row.names=1)
steam <- read.csv("~/GitHub/Sec4_FP_BryanXiao_DaiwikKashyap/data/steam.csv")
```

```{r}
#| label: Data Wrangling
#| echo: false
#| message: false

data <- data %>%
  rename(name = Name)

data$All_time.peak <- str_replace_all(data$All_time.peak, ",", "")
data$All_time.peak <- as.numeric(as.character(data$All_time.peak))

data_tidy <- data %>% 
  arrange(desc(All_time.peak), .by_group = TRUE) %>%
  slice(1:200)

MergedData <- merge(steam, data)

merged_data_tidy <- MergedData %>% 
  arrange(desc(All_time.peak), .by_group = TRUE) %>%
  slice(1:200)

```
